name: Marginsnailia
description:
An entry for #bitsyjam February 2019 on the theme of "snails". Use the arrow keys to navigate.

People often wonder why, in the margins of medieval manuscripts, you see so many pictures of knights fighting snails? Well, now it is time for the truth to be revealed - remnants of a forgotten, terrifying history that could have altered the world as we know it today!

Created with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux.
